abilityNameJapanese: ムートン・JET・三十六煩悩砲
description: A powerful combined attack where Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji coordinate their strikes simultaneously. Combines Luffy's Gomu Gomu abilities, Zoro's sword techniques, and Sanji's kick attacks into one devastating blow.
effectiveness: Successfully knocked the Pacifista into a building, though it failed to cause permanent damage due to the cyborg's durability.

description: Kizaru's light-speed movement technique where he reflects his light form off surfaces, essentially teleporting by bouncing as light beams. The technique allows near-instantaneous travel across distances.
effectiveness: Highly effective - allows Kizaru to instantly close gaps and chase down opponents with no chance of escape.
culturalReference: Named after the sacred mirror Yata no Kagami from Japanese mythology, one of the Three Imperial Regalia of Japan.

description: A powerful attack technique used by Urouge in his transformed muscular state. The attack is executed with enhanced strength from his Devil Fruit transformation.
effectiveness: Effective against the Pacifista but left Urouge vulnerable to Kizaru's counterattack.

description: Hawkins' transformation ability where he becomes a massive scarecrow-like entity with a demon face. This form represents a more powerful manifestation of his Straw-Straw Fruit abilities, combining his voodoo doll powers with increased size and strength.
effectiveness: Ineffective against Kizaru - the Admiral easily countered and defeated Hawkins despite this transformation.

description: X Drake's Ancient Zoan transformation that allows him to transform into an Allosaurus, a carnivorous dinosaur from the Late Jurassic period. In this form, Drake gains tremendous biting power, enhanced physical strength, and dinosaur-based combat abilities.
effectiveness: Strong enough to bite and damage the Pacifista, revealing it bleeds red blood, but ultimately ineffective against Kizaru.

description: Scratchmen Apoo's ability to weaponize sound by using his body as various musical instruments. The sound waves can cut through targets (severing limbs) and create explosive force. Different body parts create different instruments and attack patterns.
effectiveness: Appeared to successfully damage Kizaru, severing his arm and causing him to explode, but Kizaru's Logia powers allowed him to instantly reform unharmed.
